title:
Experimental Comparison of Average-Power Constrained and Peak-Power
  Constrained 64QAM under Optimal Clipping in 400Gbps Unamplified Coherent
  Links
abstract:
We experimentally demonstrated an end-to-end link budget optimization over
clipping in 400Gbps unamplified links, showing that the clipped MB distribution
outperforms the peak-power constrained 64QAM by 1dB link budget.
subjects: Electrical Engineering and Systems Science/Signal Processing
